001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
004
005/**
006 * A low-quality continuous noise generator with strong grid artifacts, this is nonetheless useful as a building block.
007 * This class is extremely close to {@link ValueNoise}, but allows using an {@link IPointHash} to configure how points
008 * are given values (usually to add a glitchy effect). This is almost certainly slower than ValueNoise, but should still
009 * be faster than the Cubic mode in {@link FastNoise}, which was (prior to this class being added) the only reasonable
010 * way to show the glitch effects of things like {@link FlawedPointHash.CubeHash}.
011 * <br>
012 * This implements Noise1D, Noise2D, and Noise3D, and should have more dimensionality support added later. It has much
013 * lower quality than {@link ClassicNoise}, but is structured similarly in many ways, and won't alter values obtained
014 * from a point hash.
015 */
016@Beta
017public class HashedValueNoise implements Noise.Noise1D, Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D
018//       , Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D
019{
020    public static final HashedValueNoise instance = new HashedValueNoise();
021
022    public IPointHash hash;
023    public HashedValueNoise() {
024        this(12345);
025    }
026
027    public HashedValueNoise(int seed) {
028        this.hash = new IntPointHash(seed);
029    }
030
031    public HashedValueNoise(long seed) {
032        this.hash = new HastyPointHash(seed);
033    }
034
035    public HashedValueNoise(IPointHash hash){
036        this.hash = hash;
037    }
038
039//    public static double valueNoise(int seed, double x, double y, double z, double w, double u)
040//    {
041//        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
042//        x -= xFloor;
043//        x *= x * (3 - 2 * x);
044//        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
045//        y -= yFloor;
046//        y *= y * (3 - 2 * y);
047//        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
048//        z -= zFloor;
049//        z *= z * (3 - 2 * z);
050//        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
051//        w -= wFloor;
052//        w *= w * (3 - 2 * w);
053//        int uFloor = u >= 0 ? (int) u : (int) u - 1;
054//        u -= uFloor;
055//        u *= u * (3 - 2 * u);
056//        //0xE60E3, 0xCEBD7, 0xB9C9B, 0xA6F57, 0x9609D, 0x86D51

097//    //// constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even
098//    //// they should normally be used for the 6D version of R2, but we only use 5 of the 6 constants
099//    //x should be premultiplied by 0xE60E3
100//    //y should be premultiplied by 0xCEBD7

106//        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
107//    }

193//                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + 0xD4BC7, zFloor + 0xC1EDB, wFloor, uFloor + 0xA127B, vFloor + 0x92E85, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + 0xE95E1, yFloor + 0xD4BC7, zFloor + 0xC1EDB, wFloor, uFloor + 0xA127B, vFloor + 0x92E85, seed))))

200//                                                + y * ((1 - x) * hashPart1024(xFloor, yFloor + 0xD4BC7, zFloor + 0xC1EDB, wFloor + 0xB0C8B, uFloor + 0xA127B, vFloor + 0x92E85, seed) + x * hashPart1024(xFloor + 0xE95E1, yFloor + 0xD4BC7, zFloor + 0xC1EDB, wFloor + 0xB0C8B, uFloor + 0xA127B, vFloor + 0x92E85, seed)))
201//                                ))))))
202//        ) * (0x1.0040100401004p-10);
203//    }
204//
205//    //// constants are the most significant 20 bits of constants from PhantomNoise, incremented if even
206//    //// they should normally be used for the 7D version of R2, but we only use 6 of the 7 constants
207//    //x should be premultiplied by 0xE95E1
208//    //y should be premultiplied by 0xD4BC7
209//    //z should be premultiplied by 0xC1EDB
210//    //w should be premultiplied by 0xB0C8B
211//    //u should be premultiplied by 0xA127B
212//    //v should be premultiplied by 0x92E85
213//    private static int hashPart1024(final int x, final int y, final int z, final int w, final int u, final int v, int s) {
214//        s += x ^ y ^ z ^ w ^ u ^ v;
215//        return (s ^ (s << 19 | s >>> 13) ^ (s << 5 | s >>> 27) ^ 0xD1B54A35) * 0x125493 >>> 22;
216//    }
217
218    @Override
219    public double getNoise(double x) {
220        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
221        x -= xFloor;
222        x *= x * x * (x * (x * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
223        return ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, 123) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, 123))
224                * (0x1p-31);
225    }
226
227    @Override
228    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, long seed)
229    {
230        hash.setState(seed);
231        return getNoise(x);
232    }
233
234    @Override
235    public double getNoise(double x, double y) {
236        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
237        x -= xFloor;
238        x *= x * x * (x * (x * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
239        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
240        y -= yFloor;
241        y *= y * y * (y * (y * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
242        return ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor))
243                + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1)))
244                * (0x1p-31);
245    }
246    @Override
247    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, long seed) {
248        hash.setState(seed);
249        return getNoise(x, y);
250    }
251    @Override
252    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
253        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
254        x -= xFloor;
255        x *= x * x * (x * (x * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
256        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
257        y -= yFloor;
258        y *= y * y * (y * (y * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
259        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
260        z -= zFloor;
261        z *= z * z * (z * (z * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
262        return ((1 - z) *
263                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor))
264                        + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor)))
265                + z *
266                ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1))
267                        + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1))))
268                * (0x1p-31);
269    }
270    @Override
271    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
272        hash.setState(seed);
273        return getNoise(x, y, z);
274    }
275    @Override
276    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w) {
277        int xFloor = x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
278        x -= xFloor;
279        x *= x * x * (x * (x * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
280        int yFloor = y >= 0 ? (int) y : (int) y - 1;
281        y -= yFloor;
282        y *= y * y * (y * (y * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
283        int zFloor = z >= 0 ? (int) z : (int) z - 1;
284        z -= zFloor;
285        z *= z * z * (z * (z * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
286        int wFloor = w >= 0 ? (int) w : (int) w - 1;
287        w -= wFloor;
288        w *= w * w * (w * (w * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
289        return ((1 - w) *
290                ((1 - z) *
291                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor))
292                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor)))
293                        + z *
294                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor))
295                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor))))
296                + (w *
297                ((1 - z) *
298                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor, wFloor + 1))
299                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor, wFloor + 1)))
300                        + z *
301                        ((1 - y) * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1))
302                                + y * ((1 - x) * hash.hash(xFloor, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1) + x * hash.hash(xFloor + 1, yFloor + 1, zFloor + 1, wFloor + 1))))))
303                * (0x1p-31);
304    }
305    @Override
306    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, long seed) {
307        hash.setState(seed);
308        return getNoise(x, y, z, w);
309    }
